verses.verse: (For the choir director; on the Gittith. A Psalm of David.) O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> our Lord, <S%H136><s%> How <S%H4100><s%> majestic <S%H117><s%> is Thy name <S%H8034><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> Who <S%H834><s%> hast displayed <S%H5414><s%> Thy splendor <S%H1935><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the heavens! <S%H8064><s%>

From the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of infants <S%H5768><s%> and nursing <S%H3243><s%> babes <S%H3243><s%> Thou hast established <S%H3245><s%> strength, <S%H5797><s%> Because <S%H4616><s%> of Thine adversaries, <S%H6887><s%> To make the enemy <S%H340><s%> and the revengeful <S%H5358><s%> cease. <S%H7673><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> I consider <S%H7200><s%> Thy heavens, <S%H8064><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of Thy fingers, <S%H676><s%> The moon <S%H3394><s%> and the stars, <S%H3556><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Thou hast ordained; <S%H3559><s%>
What <S%H4100><s%> is man, <S%H582><s%> that Thou dost take <S%H2142><s%> thought <S%H2142><s%> of him? And the son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> that Thou dost care <S%H6485><s%> for him?

Yet Thou hast made <S%H2637><s%> him a little <S%H4592><s%> lower <S%H2637><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> And dost crown <S%H5849><s%> him with glory <S%H9202><s%> and majesty! <S%H1926><s%>

Thou dost make him to rule <S%H4910><s%> over the works <S%H4639><s%> of Thy hands; <S%H3027><s%> Thou hast put <S%H7896><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> things <S%H3605><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> his feet, <S%H7272><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> sheep <S%H6792><s%> and oxen, <S%H504><s%> And also <S%H1571><s%> the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the field, <S%H9583><s%>

The birds <S%H6833><s%> of the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and the fish <S%H1709><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> Whatever passes <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> the paths <S%H734><s%> of the seas. <S%H3220><s%>
O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> our Lord, <S%H136><s%> How <S%H4100><s%> majestic <S%H117><s%> is Thy name <S%H8034><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the earth! <S%H776><s%>
